cover letter:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am excited to apply for the IOT Engineer at air company. As a data science student with hands-on experience in AI development, data analytics, and software engineering, I am eager to bring my technical expertise and problem-solving mindset to your team.

My experience spans across AI-driven projects and data analytics roles. During my internship at Resume Page Limited, I developed an AI-powered profile chatbot using Llama and MySQL, improving user engagement by 35%. I also engineered a business card scanner with face recognition, streamlining information exchange by 30%. My prior data analyst internship at IESHER involved analyzing World Bank data to identify policy insights, reinforcing my ability to extract meaningful narratives from complex datasets.

Beyond technical expertise, I am passionate about building impactful solutions. My recent smart fridge platform, developed for a hackathon, integrates inventory tracking with AI-powered recipe recommendations and shopping list generation—demonstrating my ability to merge AI with real-world applications. My leadership experience in tutoring and mentoring has further sharpened my communication and collaboration skills.

I am eager to contribute my analytical skills and AI-driven mindset to air company. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my experience aligns with your team’s goals. Thank you for your time, and I look forward to your response.

Best regards,
Christopher Otniel Eleazar

job_description:
• Apply data analysis, modeling, machine learning, to design and develop realtime algorithmic trading models
• Build, enhance and support research and trading tools
• Assist in research and backtest on new trading strategies

Job Requirements:

• Good Mathematical knowledge (eg. Probability, Optimization, Multivariate Time Series, Stochastic Calculus, etc)
• Strong programming skills (eg. Python, C++, OO, distributed/ concurrent architect, etc)
• Preferred relevant experience in data management with good knowledge in one or more data technology (eg. NoSQL, Spark, Flink, Kafka, Hadoop, Tensorflow, etc)
• Good knowledge in financial product, market and trade life cycle (eg. FX, Equities, Futures, Options, etc)
• Preferred hand -on data modelling and machine lea rning experience (eg. ANN, MDP, NLP, etc) Strong passion in Startup environment

job_position: Junior Developer - AI, Data Science, Machine Learning
job_description:
• Develop and maintain machine learning models  for analyzing and 
recommending creative talent.
• Collaborate with data scientists to preprocess and analyze large datasets.
• Implement and optimize AI algorithms for better performance and accuracy.
• Assist in the integration of AI models into the platform’s backend.
• Conduct research on the latest AI and machine learning techniques to improve 
existing solutions 
• Participate in code reviews and contribute to the development of best practices.
• Debug and troubleshoot technical issues related to AI func tionalities 
• Write and execute unit tests to ensure code quality.
• Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI, machine learning, and data 
science.

Job Requirements:

• Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Data Science, AI, or related field.
• Strong kno wledge of Python and relevant libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, 
PyTorch).
• Familiarity with data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation 
techniques.
•  Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases.
•  Understanding of machine learning concepts and algori thms.
•  Ability to learn quickly and adapt to new technologies.
•  Excellent communication and documentation skills.
•  Collaborative and team -oriented approach.

job_description:
We specialize in child development and have an exciting project that involves the development of an innovative AI application and game for our platform.  Our goal is to create an engaging and interactive digital experience  that enhances  children's learning and promotes their overall development.  
We are committed to building a team with diverse backgrounds, perspectives, and  skills.  
Work closely with our CEO, COO and CTOs to develop the platform
Work on Game development and  related design when needed
Engage in UI/ UX design of the platform
Flexibility to work on both software development, AI training, Machine Learning and any tech related tasks
Assist in the development and implementation of software applications, websites, or other tech -related projects.
Collaborate with team members to design, code, test, and debug software applications.
Conduct research and stay updated on the latest industry trends and technologies.
Provide technical support and troubleshooting assistanc e to users.
Assist in documenting software development processes and procedures.
Participate in team meetings and contribute innovative ideas and solutions.
Learn and utilize various programming languages, tools, and frameworks.
Job Requirements:  To be su ccessful in this role, you should meet the following job requirements:  
Programming knowledge: Familiarity with programming languages such as Java, C++, or Unity, and the ability to apply basic coding principles to develop simple applications or prototypes.
Creativity and design thinking: An interest in creating visually appealing and user -friendly interfaces, with a basic understanding of user experience concepts.
Problem -solving skills: The ability to tackle small -scale development challenges and work towa rds project milestones, with guidance from senior team members.
Eagerness to learn: A passion for technology and a willingness to expand your skills through hands-on experience and mentorship.
 Time management and organization: Some experience in managing your own tasks and meeting deadlines, though you may require support in prioritizing and planning your work.

job_description:
Job Description : 
Responsibilities:
•Using the operational data to measure the performance of different vendors
to identify area of improvements
•Identify the gap in supplier experience and redesign the process.
•Identify new business opportunities, or gap in existing operations
•Compare our service offering against other digital freight forwarders and
traditional logistics companies
•Identify the g ap in our system logic to further enhance the resources
utilization
•Optimize the shipment strategy under different business requirements
•Communicate with CFS / Ocean agents / internal teams to ensure
follow?through on replenishment orders and inventory c ommitments and to
enable best real time decisions
•Work on different datasets to enable operations to monitor the business
performance
•Support tech roadmap building and tool development (incl. defining
product requirement, logic build, user acceptance tes t) to drive
improvements in the end -to-end logistics systems, data, and processes ;
including light modeling to validate hypotheses, de -risk engineering,data
science investments and require to do a high volume of data analysis.
•Drive root cause analysis/r eporting on operational issues, developing action
plans and project managing improvements
•Conduct process mapping to identify the improvement opportunities and
execute change management to implement
•Conduct research, quantitative analyses and build busin ess models and
prioritization matrices to drive decisions and development of value -added
service (e.g. supplier product performance analysis; origin milk -run
optimization)
•Align teams (Operations, Ocean, CFS etc.) to ensure strong execution and
to underst and and manage the drivers that impact operational execution

Job Requirements : 
Qualifications: 
• University Student in Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Information 
System, Business, Mathematics  or a Supply Chain/Operations discipline 
• Experience with Microsoft Office, and proficiency with SQL (or a system 
of equal complexity) / Python  
• Strong quantitative experience, with the ability to conduct statistical 
analysis, generate insights and solutions  or build a story and strategy from 
large data sets.  
• Strong written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to lead 
discussions and communicate effectively  
• Quick learner with an analytical approach to solving problems as part of a 
team who has go od communication skills.  
• Ability to work with people in a cross -functional environment  
• Proficient in spoken and written English and Chinese; Cantonese & 
Putonghua

job_description: As a Robotics Engineer, you will be responsible for enhancing the online capabilities of our UR3E collaborative robot (cobot), designing and 3D printing custom attachments to expand its functionality, and programming a simulation robot platform to test and demonstrate various robotic features. Your primary focus will be to leverage cutting -edge robotics technologies and simulation tools to drive innovation and optimize our automation processes. Key Responsibilities: UR3E Cobot Online Integration and Connectivity: Analyze the current capabilities of the UR3E cobot and identify opportunities to e nhance its online control, programming, and monitoring capabilities. Join Universal Robots cloud -based integration solution that enables remote access, real -time control, and seamless data exchange. Ensure secure and reliable communication between the UR3E  cobot and the cloud -based platform. Develop user -friendly interfaces and dashboards for remote operation and performance monitoring of the cobot. Custom Attachment Design and 3D Printing: Collaborate with cross -functional teams to identify the specific ne eds and requirements for custom cobot attachments. Design and model 3D CAD files for the desired attachments, considering factors such as compatibility, functionality, and ergonomics. Utilize advanced 3D printing technologies, such as FDM and SLA, to fabri cate the custom attachments. Test and validate the attachments to ensure they meet performance and safety standards. Robotics Simulation Platform Development: Research and select an appropriate simulation platform (e.g., ROS, Gazebo, V -REP) that aligns wit h our requirements and technical infrastructure. Program the simulation platform to accurately model the behavior and features of the UR3E cobot and its custom attachments. Develop realistic simulation scenarios that replicate our production workflows and test various robotic capabilities, such as path planning, object manipulation, and collision avoidance. Integrate the simulation platform with our existing systems and data sources to enable seamless data exchange and process optimization. Training and Kno wledge Sharing: Develop comprehensive training materials and conduct workshops to educate the team on the enhanced capabilities of the UR3E cobot, the custom attachments, and the simulation platform. Share insights and learnings with the broader robotics a nd automation community to contribute to the advancement of the field.

job_description:
Duties We offer internships in different streams, including but not limited to AI, biomedical engineering, computer engineering, and mechanical engineering.
Below is a brief description of the main duties of each stream.
• Artificial Intelligence/ Machine Learning/ Data Science/ Mathematics: 
Perform data mining, data cleansing, and data processing. Build, train, and 
optimize machine learning models.  
• Create machine learning algorithms.
Biotechnology/ Biomedical Science: 
Assist in biomedical research, includi ng analyzing recent academic papers and 
potential automated applications to solve clinical, industrial or laboratory 
needs.
•  Biomedical Engineering: Assist in medical device research to target clinical 
needs. Work closely with talents in various discipline s to develop integrated 
biomedical products as a team 
• Computer Science/ Computer Engineering/ Software Engineering: Assist in 
web development (using XHTML, CSS and JavaScript), software development 
(Python -based preferred), and programming for automation m achines.
• Electrical Engineering/ Electronic Engineering: Assist in printed circuit board 
(PCB) design, integrating sensors or electronic components into an integrated 
system. Code in C++ to control the embedded system.
• Mechanical Engineering: Design machi ne architectures for the automation of 
medical devices.
• Assist in material science research, robotic control simulations, and building 
protocols for automated medical devices.  
Job Requirements:  
• Bachelor’s Degree in any related disciplines of the above st reams 
• Enthusiastic in the applied field  
• Well -organized, diligent and dutiful  
• Able to read and write in English  
• Able to communicate in Cantonese or Mandarin would be a plus

job_description:
QUANTier is seeking a highly motivated and talented  Technology Research  Analyst  Intern  to join our team. You will play a pivotal role in leveraging advanced technological tools and methodologies to conduct  market research,  competitor analysis, and contribute to the development of  product strategies  and a  dynamic  product roadmap. This internship offers a unique opportunity to gain a hands  on experience and insight in the field of  Quantum Technology.   

• Conduct comprehensive market research and competitor analysis to identify market needs, trends, and opportunities in the field of Quantum Software  industry.     
• Collaborate with the leadership team, including the product owner and the  development team, to contribute to the development of quantum software  product strategies and a product roadmap.   
• Assist  in defining target market segments, customer personas, and value  propositions based on research findings.   
• Collect and analyze data from various sources to provide insights and  recommendations for product enhancements and new product development.   
• Create research reports, presentations, leaflets, and excel sheets to effectively communicate research findings, product strategies, and roadmap plans.   
• Stay up -to-date with quantum industry trends and newly  emerging  technologies.  

Job Requirements:   

• Responsibility   
• Energetic   
• Communicative (for discuss and solve the task) Knowledge and Skill  
• Meet the criteria in JD

job_description:
Welldify is seeking  enthusiastic and talented Software Engineer Interns to join our  technical team. As an intern, you will work closely with our CTO and engineers to develop, test, and maintain software solutions that meet the needs of our users. This is a fantastic opportunity to gain hands -on experience in a fast -paced startup environment  and contribute to meaningful projects.  
• Collaborate with the technical team: Assist in the design, development, and  testing of software applications.  
• Write clean, maintainable code: Follow  best practices to ensure code quality  and readability.  
• Debug and troubleshoot: Identify and fix bugs and performance issues in  existing codebases.  
• Participate in code reviews: Provide and receive constructive feedback to improve code quality.  
• Learn and  grow: Take advantage of mentorship and learning opportunities to  enhance your skills and knowledge. 
Job Requirements: 
• Currently pursuing a degree: In Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.  
• Programming skills: Proficiency  in one or more programming languages such  as Python, Java, JavaScript, or C++.  
• Knowledge in React Native is a plus.  
• Problem -solving mindset: Ability to approach complex problems with a logical  and analytical mindset.  
• Team player: Strong communication s kills and the ability to work effectively in  a team environment.  
• Passion for technology: Eagerness to learn new technologies and continuously  improve your skills.

• Personal projects or contributions: Any relevant personal projects or  contributions to open -source software.
